name: Rogue in Hell (Demo)
description:
Rogue in Hell is a project developed by throughout the beginning of the year 2022. It is a rogue-lite where, after dying, the protagonist finds himself in hell and must escape from it by killing everything that moves. Collect red orbs to level up and improve your powers, use tons of different weapons and face hordes of enemies.

This game was my first attempt at this game genre. It was developed using Game Maker Studio 2.

Controls

  • WASD moves
  • Left mouse button fires and right reloads
  • Shift dash
  • Press "E" to pick up a gun and "Q" to drop them
  • Press "E" to interact with guns and NPC's

Some parts of the game are yet to be finished, souls still have no purpose, as they would serve as currency for the seller, which has not yet been implemented. Some weapons are out of balance and sometimes the player spawn can be wrong. But I believe it's playable.
